title: My Journey
description: From teaching code to building healthcare platforms—here's how I became a Technical Product Manager who bridges clinical complexity and shipping code.

steps.title: LEARN Academy
steps.subtitle: Where it all started
steps.excerpt: From career-transition student during COVID to lead instructor teaching 170+ developers—and predicting AI would change everything.

steps.title: Rugiet Health
steps.subtitle: Where I found product management
steps.excerpt: 35% retention increase by fixing a critical user experience gap—the moment I fell in love with product.

steps.title: CompoundLive
steps.subtitle: Solutions engineering and client success
steps.excerpt: Learned to translate technical complexity into client value and business outcomes.

steps.title: Teligant & Hedfirst
steps.subtitle: Building a multi-tenant healthcare platform
steps.excerpt: 9-month sprint to launch: 150+ features, $12K first-month revenue, 499 medications across 48 states.

steps.title: Product Philosophy
steps.subtitle: How I think about building products
steps.excerpt: The best product decisions aren't about what to build—they're about what not to build.

steps.title: Three Years in Healthcare
steps.subtitle: Looking back on the journey
steps.excerpt: Building platforms across prescription management, lab integration, and multi-tenant SaaS.
